label: A2B2CD6E_tP24_113_e_e_c_ef_a-001
title: Ba$_{2}$ZnGe$_{2}$S$_{6}$O Structure
comments: This is a derivative of \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC7D2_tP24_113_e_a_cef_e-001}{akermanite (Ca$_{2}$MgSi$_{2}$O$_{7}$)} with the oxygen atoms on the (4e) and (8f) sites replaced by sulfur.  The ICSD lists this under the Ca$_{2}$MgSi$_{2}$O$_{7}$ prototype.  Ba$_{2}$ZnGe$_{2}$S$_{6}$O is the oldest structure in the ICSD with this structure, so we choose it as our prototype.
